description: acquire 1 item(s) for the CT114 Tutor for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5.
full_summary:
===============

**Multifleet W8485-258223: Government of Canada Tender Announcement**

**Published Date:** 2024-06-10
**Closing Date:** 2024-06-26T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to participate in a tender process for the acquisition of Aviation Replacement Parts.

**Tender Description:**

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* M1 Composites Technology
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.

The RFP documents will be emailed directly by the Contracting Officer to the Qualified SA Holders. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

**Inquiries:**

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be submitted to the Contracting Authority:

* Ryan Duncan
* Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca

**Note:**

A Notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at least once a year to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

**Contact Information:**

* Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader
* Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
* Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG
* Email: jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Attachments:**

The Tender Notice and RFP documents can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39839/w8485-258223---npp.pdf

**Tender Status:**

The tender is closed. The winner will be announced following the evaluation process.

Please note that our team is working remotely during the COVID-19 pandemic. The
